effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,604 Parry and 3,274 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 82,024 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 10,016 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 186,830 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 10,947. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
